messages.content: You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is White Steamed Rice?
White Steamed Rice is a simple and versatile side dish, perfect as a complement to any meal.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Fried Rice?
Fried Rice is a flavorful side dish made with steamed white rice stir-fried with soy sauce, eggs, peas, carrots, and green onions.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Chow Mein?
Chow Mein is a popular side dish featuring stir-fried wheat noodles with onions, celery, and cabbage.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What are Super Greens?
Super Greens is a healthy side dish made with fresh broccoli, kale, and cabbage lightly tossed and cooked for a nutritious complement to any entree.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Beijing Beef?
Beijing Beef is a Beijing-inspired entree featuring crispy beef, bell peppers, and onions in a sweet-tangy sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Beyond The Original Orange Chicken?
Beyond The Original Orange Chicken is a plant-based entree made with Beyond Meat, featuring a sweet and tangy sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is The Original Orange Chicken?
The Original Orange Chicken is a signature entree featuring crispy chicken wok-tossed in a sweet and tangy orange sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Black Pepper Sirloin Steak?
Black Pepper Sirloin Steak is a Fujian-inspired entree with Angus steak, onions, red bell peppers, and mushrooms in a savory black pepper sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Honey Walnut Shrimp?
Honey Walnut Shrimp is a Hong Kong-inspired entree featuring large tempura-battered shrimp, wok-tossed in a honey sauce, and topped with glazed walnuts.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Grilled Teriyaki Chicken?
Grilled Teriyaki Chicken is a Hong Kong-inspired entree made with grilled chicken thigh hand-sliced to order and served with teriyaki sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Broccoli Beef?
Broccoli Beef is a Hong Kong-inspired entree featuring tender beef and fresh broccoli in a ginger soy sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Kung Pao Chicken?
Kung Pao Chicken is a Szechwan-inspired entree from Sichuan Province, featuring chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers in a bold soy-based sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Honey Sesame Chicken Breast?
Honey Sesame Chicken Breast is a Beijing-inspired entree with crispy chicken breast, green beans, and yellow bell peppers in a sweet honey sesame seed sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Mushroom Chicken?
Mushroom Chicken is a Yunnan-inspired entree made with chicken, mushrooms, and zucchini stir-fried in a soy and ginger sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Sweet Fire Chicken Breast?
Sweet Fire Chicken Breast is a Guangdong Province-inspired entree with crispy white-meat chicken, red bell peppers, onions, and pineapples in a sweet and spicy chili sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is String Bean Chicken Breast?
String Bean Chicken Breast is a savory entree featuring chicken breast, string beans, and onions in a light ginger soy sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Chicken Egg Roll?
Chicken Egg Roll is a crispy appetizer made with cabbage, carrots, green onions, and chicken in a crispy Wonton wrapper.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Veggie Spring Roll?
Veggie Spring Roll is a crispy appetizer with cabbage, celery, carrots, green onions, and Chinese noodles in a crispy Wonton wrapper.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Cream Cheese Rangoon?
Cream Cheese Rangoon is a crispy appetizer made with Wonton wrappers filled with cream cheese and served with sweet and sour sauce.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Apple Pie Roll?
Apple Pie Roll is a crispy dessert item made with Wonton wrappers filled with sweet apple filling, offering a delightful twist on traditional apple pie.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What are the vegetarian options at Panda Express?

Panda Express offers a variety of vegetarian options, including Super Greens, Mixed Vegetables, Veggie Spring Rolls, Cream Cheese Rangoon, and Beyond The Original Orange Chicken, which is a plant-based entree made with Beyond Meat.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What are the vegetarian options at Panda Express?

Panda Express offers a variety of vegetarian options, including Super Greens, Mixed Vegetables, Veggie Spring Rolls, Cream Cheese Rangoon, and Beyond The Original Orange Chicken, which is a plant-based entree made with Beyond Meat.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What are your operating hours?
Panda Express is open daily from 10 AM to 10 PM.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is The Craft of a Wok-Master?
The Craft of a Wok-Master at Panda Express involves our master chefs cooking in small batches using 8-pound woks over an open flame to achieve 'Wok Hei,' the pinnacle of aroma, smoke, and flavor.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Panda Express's commitment to fresh vegetables?
Panda Express is committed to using crisp, fresh vegetables that are expertly prepared into precise cuts by our chefs for ideal wok-cooking and a satisfying crunch in every bite.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Wok Smart at Panda Express?
Wok Smart dishes at Panda Express offer balanced options with at least 8g of protein and 300 calories or less, giving you delicious flavors without compromising on health.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is the Panda Cub Meal?

The Panda Cub Meal™ is designed for kids and parents, offering balanced options with nutritious vegetables, less than 600 calories, and one serving of fruit. It's created based on USDA dietary recommendations for children.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is the Panda Promise™?
The Panda Promise™ reflects our commitment to continually improving our dishes by reducing sodium and sugars every year. In 2021, we completely removed high-fructose corn syrup from all our recipes.
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
What is Panda Rewards®?

Panda Rewards® is a program where you can earn points toward free food, unlock surprise gifts, and enjoy exclusive benefits. Get started today to receive a Welcome Gift toward your first purchase as a member. With Panda Rewards®, Good Fortune Awaits!
You are a helpful assistant for Panda Express.
